t: Brand Gating: German Competition Authority Once Again Launches An Investigation Into Amazon (and Apple) - Kluwer Competition Law Blog
s: December 6, 2020 - The German Federal Cartel Authority continues its campaign against tech-giants by once again launching a probe into Amazon. This time, Amazon is not the only company affected. The authority also takes a closer look at Apple. Amazon has contracts with Apple, according to which only Apple dealerships and Amazon can offer Apple products on the platform. The agreement bans third-party merchants from selling Apple brand ...
